PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_CooledBeamPHistory
PropertySetDef.Definition: Common performance history attributes for a cooled beam.

PropertyDef.Name: TotalCoolingCapacity
PropertyDef.Definition: Total cooling capacity. This includes cooling capacity of beam and cooling capacity of supply air.

PropertyDef.Name: TotalHeatingCapacity
PropertyDef.Definition: Total heating capacity. This includes heating capacity of beam and heating capacity of supply air.

PropertyDef.Name: BeamCoolingCapacity
PropertyDef.Definition: Cooling capacity of beam. This excludes cooling capacity of supply air.

PropertyDef.Name: BeamHeatingCapacity
PropertyDef.Definition: Heating capacity of beam. This excludes heating capacity of supply air.

PropertyDef.Name: CorrectionFactorForCooling
PropertyDef.Definition: Correction factor k as a function of water flow rate (used to calculate cooling capacity).

PropertyDef.Name: CorrectionFactorForHeating
PropertyDef.Definition: Correction factor k as a function of water flow rate (used to calculate heating capacity).

PropertyDef.Name: WaterPressureDropCurves
PropertyDef.Definition: Water pressure drop as function of water flow rate.

PropertyDef.Name: SupplyWaterTemperatureCooling
PropertyDef.Definition: Supply water temperature in cooling mode.

PropertyDef.Name: ReturnWaterTemperatureCooling
PropertyDef.Definition: Return water temperature in cooling mode.

PropertyDef.Name: SupplyWaterTemperatureHeating
PropertyDef.Definition: Supply water temperature in heating mode.

PropertyDef.Name: ReturnWaterTemperatureHeating
PropertyDef.Definition: Return water temperature in heating mode.
